item.title: [PI]Void errors
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

void Herb(int Herb, int replaceHerb) { c.getItems().deleteItem(Herb, 1); c.getItems().addItem(replaceHerb, 1); c.sendMessage("You clean the "+c.getItems().getItemName(Herb)+"."); }
^.^ This code is supposed to be a quick fix for cleaning herbs, but i get these errors when i compile:

src\server\model\players\skills\Herblore.java:23: error: illegal start of expres sion void Herb(int Herb, int replaceHerb) { ^ src\server\model\players\skills\Herblore.java:23: error: ';' expected void Herb(int Herb, int replaceHerb) { ^ src\server\model\players\skills\Herblore.java:23: error: <identifier> expected void Herb(int Herb, int replaceHerb) { ^ src\server\model\players\skills\Herblore.java:23: error: not a statement void Herb(int Herb, int replaceHerb) { ^ src\server\model\players\skills\Herblore.java:23: error: ';' expected void Herb(int Herb, int replaceHerb) { ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Help is appreciated, Thanks in advance

Read full topic
